vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in DAIInterestRateModelV2.poke (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#383-398):
	External calls:
	- (duty) = jug.ilks(BNB-A) (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#384)
	- stabilityFeePerBlock = duty.add(jug.base()).sub(1e27).mul(1e18).div(1e27).mul(15) (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#385)
	- baseRatePerBlock = dsrPerBlock().mul(1e18).div(assumedOneMinusReserveFactorMantissa) (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#388)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- baseRatePerBlock (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#388)
	- multiplierPerBlock (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#392)
	- multiplierPerBlock (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#394)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message: JugLike.base should be constant (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#422)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version

	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#36): it allows old versions

	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (DAIInterestRateModelV2.sol#308): it allows old versions
